00019 #ifndef _IPL98_GF_C_ONLY_H
00020 #define _IPL98_GF_C_ONLY_H
00021 
00022 #include "../../ipl98_setup.h" /* always include the setup file */
00023 #include <math.h>
00024 
00025 #ifdef _IPL98_USING_CPP
00026 namespace ipl{ /* use namespace if C++ */
00027 extern "C" { /* prevent name mangling for C functions */
00028 #endif
00029 
00032 #ifndef PI
00033 #define PI 3.1415926535897932384626433832795
00034 #endif
00035 
00037 #ifndef PI2
00038 #define PI2 6.283185307179586476925286766559
00039 #endif
00040 
00045 #define k_Sqr(x) ((x)*(x))
00046 
00051 #define k_Max(x,y) ((x)>(y) ? (x) : (y))
00052 
00057 #define k_Min(x,y) ((x)<(y) ? (x) : (y))
00058 
00063 #define k_Round(x) ((x)<0 ? (int)(x-0.5) : (int)(x+0.5))
00064 
00069 #define k_RoundUINT8(x) ((x)<0 ? 0 : ((x>255) ? 255 : (UINT8)(x+0.5)))
00070 
00071 #ifdef _IPL98_USING_CPP
00072 } /* end of extern "C" */
00073 } /* end namespace ipl */
00074 #endif
00075 
00076 #endif /* _IPL98_GF_C_ONLY_H */
